subject: Hockey, Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Angie Loy scored in the 47th minute to help the United States field hockey team hold off Belgium, 3-2, at an Olympic qualifying tournament in Kazan, Russia. The Americans (1-0) must win the event to advance to the Games.
snippet: Angie Loy scored in the 47th minute to help the United States field hockey team hold off Belgium, 3-2, at an Olympic qualifying tournament in Kazan, Russia. The Americans (1-0) must win the event to advance to the Games.
